Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial AdminBlock implementation

- Next.js 14 App Router with TypeScript
- Supabase auth + Postgres database
- Drizzle ORM schema \(clients, orders, comments, attachments\)
- Mobile-responsive layout with bottom navigation
- Orders and clients CRUD with TanStack Query
- WhatsApp/Instagram quick message integration
- Spanish UI for family print shop business

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

feat: improve clients section with stats, edit, and quick contacts

- Add order statistics per client \(count, total spent, last order\)
- Add edit client functionality with modal reuse
- Add quick contact buttons \(WhatsApp, Instagram, call\)
- Add client stats dashboard \(total, new this month, top client, revenue\)
- Create /api/clients/stats endpoint for client analytics

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")
